briefDescription: It gives us immense   pleasure to   inform   you    that Urja Gyan an   NGO initiative by the Urja Gyan Foundation based in Mumbai is in the field to educate organizations in the matter of energy conservation, efficiency, regulations and economies. The website in which all information regarding energy, demand, rules & regulations, policy and deviation from state to state should be brought out in a proper perspective. We are happy to inform you that we have launched a website – www.urjagyan.com – which has received tremendous response. We are happy to inform you that the website has already been hit with more than 10 Lac visitors in just One Year time. The website will give you comprehensive and updated information in respect of all Poli
